Beneficial Microbes

Whatsapp Channel


We send you customised courses for your farming type daily to your mobile phone. Courses are easy and take just 7 minutes.

How to use:

  • 1Add one of the numbers below to your contacts.
  • 2Send “Start” on WhatsApp to it. Within 24 hours you will receive your first daily lesson.

Where to get Whatsapp:

WhatsApp, also free-to-use, can be downloaded at the Apple App Store or Google Play. Make sure notifications are enabled. To unsubscribe just message “STOP” or delete the contact. Anyway the messages will remain in your chat history. Please don`t send any further messages or questions, they can`t be answered.
